headline.main: Obama Asks Americans to Stay Vigilant Against Potential Acts of Terrorism
headline.print_headline: Obama Asks Americans to Stay Vigilant Against Potential Acts of Terrorism

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Friday asked Americans to remain vigilant as he sought to assure them that his administration was working overtime to keep them safe by "squeezing" the heart of Islamic State overseas....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Friday asked Americans to remain vigilant as he sought to assure them that his administration was working overtime to keep them safe by "squeezing" the heart of Islamic State overseas.

headline.main: New Mexico Gov Apologizes for Staff's Conduct at Hotel Party
headline.print_headline: New Mexico Gov Apologizes for Staff's Conduct at Hotel Party

docs.snippet: New Mexico Gov. Susana Martinez on Friday apologized for the actions of her staff during her annual holiday party at a downtown Santa Fe hotel and also said she should have handled it differently....
docs.lead_paragraph: New Mexico Gov. Susana Martinez on Friday apologized for the actions of her staff during her annual holiday party at a downtown Santa Fe hotel and also said she should have handled it differently.

headline.main: Cuba's Castro Says U.S. Can Do More to Normalise Relations
headline.print_headline: Cuba's Castro Says U.S. Can Do More to Normalise Relations

docs.snippet: Cuba is willing to keep improving relations with the United States even though Washington has failed to meet its key demands for normalization, Cuban President Raul Castro said on Friday, a day after the anniversary of detente....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cuba is willing to keep improving relations with the United States even though Washington has failed to meet its key demands for normalization, Cuban President Raul Castro said on Friday, a day after the anniversary of detente.

headline.main: Ted Cruz’s Immigration Advice to George W. Bush

docs.snippet: As a policy aide on Mr. Bush's 2000 presidential campaign, Mr. Cruz struck a very different tone on immigration than he is offering today....
docs.lead_paragraph: As a policy aide on Mr. Bush's 2000 presidential campaign, Mr. Cruz struck a very different tone on immigration than he is offering today.

headline.main: Senate Roll Call Vote on Budget
headline.print_headline: Senate Roll Call Vote on Budget

docs.snippet: The 65-33 roll call on Friday by which the Senate passed a bipartisan budget package that boosts federal agency spending and awards tax cuts both to families and an array of business interests....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 65-33 roll call on Friday by which the Senate passed a bipartisan budget package that boosts federal agency spending and awards tax cuts both to families and an array of business interests.

headline.main: Detroit Pastor Won't Be Charged in Fatal Church Shooting
headline.print_headline: Detroit Pastor Won't Be Charged in Fatal Church Shooting

docs.snippet: A pastor who fatally shot a man inside a Detroit storefront church won't face charges, prosecutors announced Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A pastor who fatally shot a man inside a Detroit storefront church won't face charges, prosecutors announced Friday.

headline.main: Bosnian Serbs Reinstate Ties With National Police
headline.print_headline: Bosnian Serbs Reinstate Ties With National Police

docs.snippet: Police in Bosnia's autonomous Serb Republic signed a deal on Friday to re-establish cooperation with the national police force, eight days after breaking off ties in a move that fuelled doubts over whether the fractured country could hold together...
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in Bosnia's autonomous Serb Republic signed a deal on Friday to re-establish cooperation with the national police force, eight days after breaking off ties in a move that fuelled doubts over whether the fractured country could hold together.

headline.sub: NYT's Stewart: Junk bond rout that wasn't

docs.snippet: James B. Stewart, on CNBC, discusses why the problems facing the Third Avenue Focused Credit Fund, which said it would halt redemptions and liquidate after suffering large losses, haven't spread across Wall Street....
docs.lead_paragraph: James B. Stewart, on CNBC, discusses why the problems facing the Third Avenue Focused Credit Fund, which said it would halt redemptions and liquidate after suffering large losses, haven't spread across Wall Street.
